languages.text: {m}Кажется, что кости черепа разом начали сжиматься, заключив перекрученный спазмами мозг в давящую клетку. Слезы превращают мир в растекшиеся пятна, где-то вдали звенит странный звук — должно быть, ваш крик.{/m}

{m}You feel as if the bones of your skull have begun to contract, crushing your spasm-ridden brain from all sides like an ever-shrinking cage. The world becomes a swimming blur obscured by a veil of tears, and you hear a strange ringing from somewhere far away — most likely your drawn-out scream.{/m}
languages.original_text: {m}Кажется, что кости черепа разом начали сжиматься, заключив перекрученный спазмами мозг в давящую клетку. Слезы превращают мир в растекшиеся пятна, где-то вдали звенит странный звук — должно быть, ваш крик.{/m}

The world becomes a swimming blur obscured by a veil of tears, and you hear a strange ringing from somewhere far away — most likely your drawn-out scream.{/m}

languages.text: {m}頭蓋骨の骨が収縮を始め、まるで痙攣を起こした脳を四方から押しつぶさんとする、縮みゆく檻のように感じる。世界が涙のヴェールによってぼやけ、どこか遠くから奇妙な残響が聞こえてくるーーそれはまるで、己の発した叫び声のようだった。{/m}
languages.original_text: {m}You feel as if the bones of your skull have begun to contract, crushing your spasm-ridden brain from all sides like an ever-shrinking cage. The world becomes a swimming blur obscured by a veil of tears, and you hear a strange ringing from somewhere far away — most likely your drawn-out scream.{/m}

traits.locale_text: {m}頭蓋骨の骨が収縮を始め、まるで痙攣を起こした脳を四方から押しつぶさんとする、縮みゆく檻のように感じる。世界が涙のヴェールによってぼやけ、どこか遠くから奇妙な残響が聞こえてくるーーそれはまるで、己の発した叫び声のようだった。{/m}

languages.text: {m}你感觉自己的头骨开始收缩，仿佛不断缩小的笼子一样，从四面八方碾压着你痉挛的大脑。你的泪水夺眶而出，整个世界都变得模糊不堪。随后，你听到了远处传来了古怪的叫喊声——那很可能是你自己一刻不停的惨叫。{/m}
languages.original_text: {m}You feel as if the bones of your skull have begun to contract, crushing your spasm-ridden brain from all sides like an ever-shrinking cage. The world becomes a swimming blur obscured by a veil of tears, and you hear a strange ringing from somewhere far away — most likely your drawn-out scream.{/m}

traits.locale_text: {m}你感觉自己的头骨开始收缩，仿佛不断缩小的笼子一样，从四面八方碾压着你痉挛的大脑。你的泪水夺眶而出，整个世界都变得模糊不堪。随后，你听到了远处传来了古怪的叫喊声——那很可能是你自己一刻不停的惨叫。{/m}

languages.text: {m}Vous avez l'impression que les os de votre crâne se contractent et écrasent votre cerveau spasmodique telle une cage rétrécissant à vue d'œil. Le monde n'est plus qu'une tache floue obscurcie par un voile de larmes et vous entendez un étrange sifflement au loin... Certainement votre propre cri.{/m}
languages.original_text: {m}You feel as if the bones of your skull have begun to contract, crushing your spasm-ridden brain from all sides like an ever-shrinking cage. The world becomes a swimming blur obscured by a veil of tears, and you hear a strange ringing from somewhere far away — most likely your drawn-out scream.{/m}

traits.locale_text: {m}Vous avez l'impression que les os de votre crâne se contractent et écrasent votre cerveau spasmodique telle une cage rétrécissant à vue d'œil. Le monde n'est plus qu'une tache floue obscurcie par un voile de larmes et vous entendez un étrange sifflement au loin... Certainement votre propre cri.{/m}

languages.text: {m}Sientes que los huesos de tu cráneo se contraen, aplastando tu cerebro durante sus espasmos como una jaula cada vez más pequeña. El mundo se vuelve un borrón oculto tras un velo de lágrimas y oyes un extraño sonido que proviene de la lejanía. Probablemente sea tu propio grito.{/m}
languages.original_text: {m}You feel as if the bones of your skull have begun to contract, crushing your spasm-ridden brain from all sides like an ever-shrinking cage. The world becomes a swimming blur obscured by a veil of tears, and you hear a strange ringing from somewhere far away — most likely your drawn-out scream.{/m}

traits.locale_text: {m}Sientes que los huesos de tu cráneo se contraen, aplastando tu cerebro durante sus espasmos como una jaula cada vez más pequeña. El mundo se vuelve un borrón oculto tras un velo de lágrimas y oyes un extraño sonido que proviene de la lejanía. Probablemente sea tu propio grito.{/m}

languages.text: {m}Du hast das Gefühl, als würden die Knochen deines Schädels schrumpfen und dein von Krämpfen geplagtes Gehirn langsam zerquetschen. Die Welt verschwimmt hinter einem Schleier von Tränen und du hörst aus der Ferne ein seltsames Geräusch ... vermutlich deine verklingenden Schreie.{/m}
languages.original_text: {m}You feel as if the bones of your skull have begun to contract, crushing your spasm-ridden brain from all sides like an ever-shrinking cage. The world becomes a swimming blur obscured by a veil of tears, and you hear a strange ringing from somewhere far away — most likely your drawn-out scream.{/m}

traits.locale_text: {m}Du hast das Gefühl, als würden die Knochen deines Schädels schrumpfen und dein von Krämpfen geplagtes Gehirn langsam zerquetschen. Die Welt verschwimmt hinter einem Schleier von Tränen und du hörst aus der Ferne ein seltsames Geräusch ... vermutlich deine verklingenden Schreie.{/m}

languages.text: {m}Kafatasındaki kemiklerin büzülmeye başladığını, spazmlar geçiren beynini sürekli daralan bir kafes gibi her yandan sıkıştırıp ezdiğini hissediyorsun. Dünya, gözyaşların nedeniyle bulanık ve akışkan bir görüntüye bürünüyor, uzaklardan bir yerden tuhaf bir ses duyuyorsun. Büyük ihtimalle attığın uzun çığlıkların sesini....{/m}
languages.original_text: {m}You feel as if the bones of your skull have begun to contract, crushing your spasm-ridden brain from all sides like an ever-shrinking cage. The world becomes a swimming blur obscured by a veil of tears, and you hear a strange ringing from somewhere far away — most likely your drawn-out scream.{/m}

traits.locale_text: {m}Kafatasındaki kemiklerin büzülmeye başladığını, spazmlar geçiren beynini sürekli daralan bir kafes gibi tüm yönlerden sıkıştırıp ezdiğini hissediyorsun. Dünya, gözyaşların nedeniyle bulanık ve akışkan bir görüntüye bürünüyor ve uzaklardan bir yerden tuhaf bir ses duyuyorsun. Büyük ihtimalle attığın uzun çığlıkların sesi.{/m}
